==== Notes ====

Use restricted hardware applet/package manager to get latest Nvidia drivers. Compiz works great with proper drivers installed. Use synaptic package manager to get broadcom drivers for NIC (B4311). Sleep/Hibernate will not work unless NIC is recognized so get that working first.
